articles.author: WLWT Digital Staff
articles.title: Mask mandate, all Ohio virus orders will be lifted June 2 - WLWT Cincinnati
articles.description: The state of Ohio is removing all COVID-19 health orders, effective June 2.
articles.content:
COLUMBUS, Ohio —The state of Ohio is lifting all COVID-19 health orders, effective June 2.
Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine made that announcement Wednesday, saying that in three weeks, the state will remove h… [+2619 chars]
